title: book_Love's_Executioner
text:
ISBN-13: 9780140128468.
ISBN-10: 0140128468.
Title: Love's Executioner.
Subtitle: And Other Tales of Psychotherapy.
Authors: Irvin D. Yalom.
Categories: Existential psychotherapy.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=ZBptQgAACAAJ&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: Contains eight case-studies of people the author has treated, including a woman of 67, obsessively pining with love for her 32-year-old previous therapist and a woman of 19 stone who has emotional difficulties because of her weight problem. This title includes stories that reveal the diversity of human motivation..
Published Year: 1991.
Average Rating: 4.2.
Number of Pages: 270.
Ratings Count: 216.
